Description:
This is a wonderful kit made by me DarkWolfModding. Much Like my other kit "Skyrim Body Kit" this one aims to help modders with the skeleton files by adding the skeletons and some meshes as well. (Check Contents of this kit to see whats Exactly in it).

Skeleton Kit Contents:
This kit Contains the following:
- Male and Female (Both beast and human) Skeleton Nif Files
- Male and Female Full Body meshes (Default Skyrim bodies)
- Male and Female Set of Ebony Armor to attach to the skeleton when you make a "Dummy Skeleton" for positioning the Items. SEE PICTURES FOLDER
- Full Set of Ebony Weapons so you can attach them to the "Dummy Skeleton" SEE PICTURES FOLDER - Male and Female Skeleton files (Both beast and human) for the mod Belt Fastened Quivers

Usage:
This is a modders resource so you can use it at your own free will for your mods.
Don't Re-Upload this mod anywere.

Installation:
Put the folder called "Skyrim Skeleton Kit (SSK)" anywere you want (I recommend the Desktop for easy access)

Un-Installation:
Remove the folder "Skyrim Skeleton Kit (SSK)" from wherever you put it in.

Future Updates:
Will add support for werewolf's and Vampire Lords
[/size]
author: DarkWolfModding
